messages.title: VOTE FORWARD WHAT YOU BELIEVE IN
messages.content: A fairer, more equal society with no more austerity. A minimum wage that is a living-wage: £10/hour by 2020. Abolish university tuition fees, cancel student debt and create apprenticeship places for 16-25 year olds. Build affordable, efficient homes and tackle the housing crisis. Maintaining a publicly funded, publicly provided National Health Service. End pensioner poverty with a weekly citizens’ pension of £180 for a single person and £310 for a couple. Cut bus & rail fares by 10% and create safer roads for cyclists. Combat Climate Change, investing in renewable and efficient energy production. Return the railways to public hands and improve services.
